tooltips.reference: Unique identifier for the piece (e.g.: FT1 - Drawer front)
tooltips.materials: Type of substrate to be treated
tooltips.finish: Lacquer = opaque color / Varnish = transparent or tinted
tooltips.tint: Appears for Varnish. Surcharge +10EUR/sq.m for custom tints
tooltips.gloss: Gloss level. Price varies by finish
tooltips.dimensions: Length x Width x Thickness in millimeters
tooltips.faces: Number of faces to treat (1 or 2). Price doubled for 2 faces
tooltips.edges: Sides to lacquer/varnish. A and C = lengths, B and D = widths
tooltips.drilling: Drilling option for your panels. Fee: 2EUR per piece
tooltips.copy: Duplicate the line. You will need to enter a new reference

status.title: Line Status
status.content:
This indicator shows your entry progress:

Empty - You haven't started filling this line yet.

In progress - Some fields are filled but information is missing.

Complete - All required fields are filled, the line is ready.

Error - There's an issue to correct (invalid value, missing field...).

reference.title: Part Reference
reference.content:
Give a name or code to this piece for easy identification.

Examples: "FT1 - Drawer front", "Kitchen door", "Living room panel"...

This reference will appear on your quote and order form.

material.title: Material Type
material.content:
Select the type of substrate you are sending us:

MDF - Fiber board, perfect for lacquering

Veneered panel - Substrate covered with natural veneer

Solid wood - Oak, walnut, beech pieces, etc.

Melamine - Panel with melamine coating

finish.title: Finish Type
finish.content:
Choose between two types of finish:

LACQUER - Opaque paint that completely covers the substrate. You must provide a RAL color code or manufacturer reference.

VARNISH - Transparent or tinted finish that leaves the wood grain visible. Ideal for showcasing noble wood species.

tint.title: Tint / Color Code
tint.content:
If you chose VARNISH:
Indicate the desired tint (Natural oak, Dark walnut, Wenge...). A surcharge of 10EUR/sq.m applies for custom tints.

If you chose LACQUER:
Enter the RAL color code (e.g.: RAL 9010) or manufacturer reference (NCS, Pantone...).

gloss.title: Gloss Level
gloss.content:
Choose the desired gloss appearance:

Soft Touch - Ultra-matte velvety touch (premium)

0 Gloss Natural - Absolute natural matte (varnish only)

10 Gloss Matte - Matte with slight sheen

30 Gloss Satin - Balanced satin, soft reflections

75 Gloss Brilliant - Pronounced glossy

90 Gloss Polished Mirror - Ultra-glossy mirror effect (premium)

Pricing varies by level chosen.

dimensions.title: Part Dimensions
dimensions.content:
Enter your piece dimensions in millimeters:

Length - The longest dimension

Width - The perpendicular dimension

Thickness - Panel thickness (19mm default)

Important: Minimum billable surface is 0.25 sq.m per face. Small pieces are billed at this minimum.

faces.title: Number of Faces
faces.content:
How many faces need to be treated?

1 FACE - Only the visible face will be lacquered/varnished. Choose this if the back is against a wall or hidden.

2 FACES - Both sides will be treated. Necessary for doors, partitions, or elements visible from both sides.

Price is doubled if you choose 2 faces.

edges.title: Edges to Treat
edges.content:
Select the edges to treat:

A and C - The two sides along the length

B and D - The two sides along the width

By default, all 4 edges are selected. Uncheck those that aren't visible (against a wall for example).

Rate: 8EUR per linear meter.

machining.title: Special Machining
machining.content:
Additional machining options:

Handle groove - Groove to open without a handle (20EUR/lin.m)

Visible groove - Decorative groove (10EUR/lin.m)

Molding - Decorative molded profile (20EUR/lin.m)

Click the icon to configure machining and indicate quantities in linear meters.

drilling.title: Drilling
drilling.content:
Drilling option for your panels.

WITH DRILLING:
We perform the necessary drilling on your panels according to your specifications.
Fee: 2EUR per piece.

Drilling is done before finishing for a clean, professional result.

price.title: Price excl. VAT
price.content:
Price before tax is calculated automatically based on:

Surface treated (minimum 0.25 sq.m per face)

Finish type (lacquer or varnish)

Gloss level chosen

Number of faces (1 or 2)

Edges selected (8EUR/lin.m)

Any machining

Sanding if checked (6EUR/sq.m)

actions.title: Actions
actions.content:
Duplicate - Creates an identical copy of this line. Useful for similar pieces with the same characteristics.

Delete - Removes this line from the quote. Warning, this action is permanent.

panelReminder.title: Panel
panelReminder.content: Reminder of the selected panel for this configuration.

optionalFinish.title: Optional Finish
optionalFinish.content: Check to add a finish (varnish, tint+varnish or lacquer). A finish line will be created under the panel.

summary.orderMinimum: Minimum: {surface} sq.m billed per face or {amount} EUR excl. VAT per order

validation.title: Validation required
validation.atLeastOneCompleteLine: At least one complete line is required

dxf.noPanels: No panels found in DXF file
